metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36325 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in Jansson through 2.13.1. Due to aparsing error in json_loads, there's an out-of-bounds read-access bug.NOTE: the vendor reports that this only occurs when a programmer fails tofollow the API specification.

criterions.comment: jansson: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
